title: Delete a Git Stash
description: In Git, a stash is a way to save changes that are not yet ready to be committed. Stashes are useful when you need to switch to a different branch or work on a different task, but you don't want to commit your changes yet. However, sometimes you may need to delete a stash that is no longer needed. In this challenge, you will learn how to delete a specific stash in Git.

meta.title: Delete a Git Stash
meta.description: Learn how to delete a specific Git stash and manage your repository effectively.
meta.keywords: version control, repository, delete, git labs, stash, git, git playground

verify.name: Verify for successful deletion
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 删除 Git 暂存
i18n.description: 在 Git 中，暂存是一种保存尚未准备好提交的更改的方法。当你需要切换到不同的分支或处理不同的任务，但又不想提交更改时，暂存就很有用。然而，有时你可能需要删除不再需要的暂存。在这个挑战中，你将学习如何在 Git 中删除特定的暂存。

meta.title: 删除 Git 暂存
meta.description: 学习如何删除特定的 Git 暂存并有效管理你的仓库。
meta.keywords: 版本控制, 仓库, 删除, Git 实验室, 暂存, Git, Git 游乐场

verify.name: 验证删除是否成功
